desc: 100% naturally sweet, Low carb, No Added Sugar, naturally sweet foods, syrups and toppings. Made with Monk Fruit extract, known as Luo Han Guo, Siraitia grosvenorii, Buddha fruit, Arhat fruit. Our Monkfruit Sweetened products are made with Erythritol, the friendly sugar alcohol (😬Xylitol, Manitol, Sorbitol) Stevia-free
